item.description:
You're Invited!

Courageous Sailing Center cordially invites you to our 12th Annual Make-A-Mark Celebration in support of our Inner City Youth Enrichment Program, offering free lessons and memberships to Boston's youngest sailors.

Tuesday, July 15, 2008
6:00 pm ? 10:00 pm
Charlestown Navy Yard, Pier 4

Dancing to the live music of the Chad Hollister Band
Great Food and Drink
Youth Program Regatta
Live Auction and Silent Auction with extraordinary items

Tickets: $75

To purchase tickets or for more information, please visit us at www.courageoussailing.org/tickets or call 617.242.3821

We hope to see you there.

Sincerely,
Courageous Sailing Center
Make a Mark logo
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there, but haven't decided what to wear just yet. I'll put in comments.
item.name: 12th Annual Make a Mark Gala (Benefit for youth sailing program)
